docs.abstract: Now we have written a book together.
docs.snippet: Now we have written a book together.
docs.lead_paragraph: At the end of my 40s, I am a father again for the second time, when I never expected to be a father at all. My own father, 85, was elated when I told him of his fifth grandchild.

headline.main: Every Moment With My Son Is an Act of Creation
headline.print_headline: Bridging the Gaps in Time and Love

docs.abstract: How to survive the internet in 2020. (It’s not going to be easy.)
docs.snippet: How to survive the internet in 2020. (It’s not going to be easy.)
docs.lead_paragraph: The new year is here, and online, the forecast calls for several seasons of hell. Tech giants and the media have scarcely figured out all that went wrong during the last presidential election — viral misinformation, state-sponsored propaganda, bots aplenty, all of us cleaved into our own tribal reality bubbles — yet here we go again, headlong into another experiment in digitally mediated democracy.

docs.abstract: Sheriffs in western Nebraska and eastern Colorado say they don’t know who’s flying the drones — or why. The F.A.A. is investigating.
docs.snippet: Sheriffs in western Nebraska and eastern Colorado say they don’t know who’s flying the drones — or why. The F.A.A. is investigating.
docs.lead_paragraph: They come in the night: Drones — lots of them — flying in precise formations over the Colorado and Nebraska prairie.

headline.main: ‘It’s Creepy’: Unexplained Drones Are Swarming by Night Over Colorado
headline.print_headline: ‘It’s Creepy’: Unexplained Drones Swarm by Night Over Prairie

docs.abstract: All year long, Earth passes through streams of cosmic debris. Here’s a list of major meteor showers and how to spot one.
docs.snippet: All year long, Earth passes through streams of cosmic debris. Here’s a list of major meteor showers and how to spot one.
docs.lead_paragraph: All year long as Earth revolves around the sun, it passes through streams of cosmic debris. The resulting meteor showers can light up night skies from dusk to dawn, and if you’re lucky you might be able to catch one.

headline.main: Meteor Showers in 2020 That Will Light Up Night Skies

docs.abstract: Sales doubled in 2019, but the industry’s tipping point — severing ties to the gas pump — still lies ahead. These cars will help make that happen.
docs.snippet: Sales doubled in 2019, but the industry’s tipping point — severing ties to the gas pump — still lies ahead. These cars will help make that happen.
docs.lead_paragraph: This article is part of our continuing Fast Forward series, which examines technological, economic, social and cultural shifts that happen as businesses evolve.

headline.print_headline: Zero to 60 in 2.2 Seconds? Electric Vehicles to Watch

docs.abstract: In 1920, Prohibition went into effect, but America partied on.
docs.snippet: In 1920, Prohibition went into effect, but America partied on.
docs.lead_paragraph: As the sun rose this morning on a new year, bleary-eyed people across the United States poured out their half-drunk champagne bottles, gathered up their empty beer cans and turned to Twitter to share their resolution with the world.

headline.main: 100 Years Ago, the Booziest January Suddenly Dried Up
headline.print_headline: A Splashy Start to Prohibition, 100 Not-So-Dry Januaries Ago

docs.abstract: A celebration to mark the end of a cycle of Talmudic study carried extra meaning in the wake of deadly anti-Semitic attacks.
docs.snippet: A celebration to mark the end of a cycle of Talmudic study carried extra meaning in the wake of deadly anti-Semitic attacks.
docs.lead_paragraph: EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. — For the past century, thousands of Jews have participated in a shared and daunting religious feat, reading the same page of the Talmud every day until they finish all 38 volumes of that central text of Jewish religious law and rabbinical debates. The task takes almost seven and a half years to complete and ends in a colossal party.

headline.main: 90,000 Jews Gather to Pray and Defy a Wave of Hate
headline.print_headline: 90,000 Jews Gather to Pray and to Defy a Wave of Hate

docs.abstract: After a family tragedy, the Australian director found a home in the theater, creating harrowing updates of classics. His latest: “Medea” at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
docs.snippet: After a family tragedy, the Australian director found a home in the theater, creating harrowing updates of classics. His latest: “Medea” at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON — A woman, abandoned by her husband, murders her children. A man, conspiring with his sister, stabs his mother. A young woman slits her throat with her lover’s razor. A girl shoots herself. A boy shoots himself. A child walks into the sea.

headline.main: Simon Stone Faced the Unthinkable. He Thinks You Should Too.

docs.abstract: Kim Jong-un just restarted his dance of death with America.
docs.snippet: Kim Jong-un just restarted his dance of death with America.
docs.lead_paragraph: Is anyone surprised? On the last day of 2019, after months of threatening the United States to ease its nuclear standoff with “a bold decision” by year’s end — or else — the leader of North Korea darkly announced that the country would unveil a new strategic weapon “in the near future.” Kim Jong-un also declared an end to a moratorium on nuclear weapons and missile tests. On the first day of 2020, he did not deliver his customary, often fiery, New Year’s address. In other words, he interrupted his regularly scheduled program to bring us his latest threat.

headline.main: North Korea Is Not Done Trolling Trump

docs.abstract: Many people say they don’t have the time to work out. But most of us spend hours each day viewing screens.
docs.snippet: Many people say they don’t have the time to work out. But most of us spend hours each day viewing screens.
docs.lead_paragraph: If, like many of us, your New Year’s resolution is to find more time to exercise, you may be in luck. According to a recent study of how Americans typically spend their waking hours, almost all of us have far more leisure time available than we think we do.

headline.main: No More Excuses Not to Exercise
headline.print_headline: Drop the Phone, Grab the Bike
